resources.string:
Please place your finger on the device's camera, covering the flash as well.
 After 10 seconds, you can export the results with the Share button. 

 This utility works by measuring the amount of red it sees through the camera, and attempting to detect the fluctuations. 
 It works better in a darkened room, and when the pressure on the camera is constant.
Heart rate raw data as of %s

Final result:
%s
Normalized results and detected peaks:
%s
Camera permission is required for this application to work.
